content.prompt: Past records indicate that 15 percent of the flights for a certain airline are delayed. Suppose flights are randomly selected one at a time from all flights. Assume each selection is independent of another. Which of the following is closest to the probability that it will take 5 selections to find one flight that is delayed?

unit.text: 4: Probability, Random Variables, and Probability Distributions

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine relative frequencies, proportions, or probabilities using simulation or calculations.
